revised_title: On the Development of the Ciliary or Motor Oculi Ganglion
tldr: The author examines the development and variations of the ciliary ganglion in Elasmobranchs, providing insights into its origin, relations, and homology. The study reveals that the ciliary ganglion is a sympathetic ganglion, similar to the relationship between the sympathetic ganglia of the trunk and the spinal nerves.
